attributes.action: Reassess the government's belief in man-made CO2 causing climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Global Warming" has stopped happening since 1998. If man-made carbon dioxide were the cause of earlier temperature rises the the phenomenon would be ongoing as the rate of human generation of CO2 has accelerated over this period. Therefore carbon taxes are pointless other than as a convenient means of general taxation.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
